title: Implement Plan Phase - Decomposition + Ship It
description: Wire up the Plan phase: AI-assisted feature decomposition from PRD, Plan markdown generation, beads epic/gate task creation, dependency graph visualization, Ship It! button that closes gate tasks. See PRD Section 7.2.
close_reason: Implemented Plan Phase: AI decomposition, Plan markdown, beads epic/gate, dependency graph visualization, Ship It! and Re-ship buttons

title: Fix undefined crash in TaskService.extractEpicId when viewing live agent output
description: When subscribing to live agent output for a task in the Build phase (e.g. opensprint.dev-dlp), the server throws: . The error occurs in TaskService.extractEpicId at line 102, which is called from beadsIssueToTask when converting a beads issue to a Task. The root cause is that  can be undefined when passed to extractEpicId, but the function calls  without a null/undefined check. Add a guard in extractEpicId to handle undefined/null id (e.g. return null early), and optionally add defensive handling in beadsIssueToTask when issue.id is missing.
close_reason: Fixed extractEpicId guard and beadsIssueToTask defensive handling

title: Implement login endpoint
close_reason: Implemented login endpoint: POST /api/v1/auth/login with JWT, bcrypt validation, auth config at ~/.opensprint/auth.json

close_reason: Implemented drag-to-resize split between chat and PRD panes in Design tab

title: Show connection status only when offline
description: Change the top-right connection indicator so it is hidden when the server is online and websockets are connected. Only show it when the server is offline or websockets are disconnected, displaying a red dot and the text "offline" instead of the current green dot and "online".
close_reason: Show connection status only when offline

title: Pre-hydrate build page with tasks state to prevent loading flash
description: When the build page loads, it should be pre-hydrated with the current tasks state (e.g., via an initial API fetch or server-rendered data) rather than waiting for the first websocket payload. This avoids a flash of empty or loading content before tasks appear.

title: Update URL slug when navigating between plan, build, and validate tabs
description: When users switch between the plan, build, and validate tabs, the URL does not update to reflect the current tab/view. The URL slug should change to match the active phase so that: (1) users can bookmark or share links to specific phases, (2) browser back/forward works as expected, and (3) the URL stays in sync with the visible content.

Epic covers: ActiveAgentsService, instrumentation of all phases, API endpoint, WebSocket events, and UI component.

title: Fix real-time state update when feedback agent completes
description: When submitting feedback, the server logs indicate the agent completed successfully, but the frontend does not update the state from 'pending' to 'mapped' until the page is refreshed. This suggests a bug with websocket handling—either the client is not receiving the completion event, not processing it correctly, or the state update is not being triggered. The fix should ensure the frontend reflects the server state in real-time without requiring a manual refresh.
close_reason: Fix real-time state update: refetch feedback list on feedback.mapped; broadcast in all status→mapped code paths

title: Add multiple image attachment support to feedback input

title: Implement wizard step 1: project metadata
description: Create React wizard component with step 1: project name and description inputs. Validation: non-empty name. Store in wizard state.

title: Implement wizard step 2: agent configuration
description: Add step 2 with planning agent and coding agent selectors. Integrate agent type (Claude/Cursor/Custom) and model dropdown. Persist to wizard state.
close_reason: Step 2 (agents) already implemented: planning/coding agent selectors, agent type (Claude/Cursor/Custom), model dropdown, persisted to wizard state in ProjectSetup.tsx

title: Implement wizard step 3: deployment configuration
description: Add step 3: deployment mode (Expo.dev / Custom). For Custom: command or webhook URL input. Persist to wizard state.

title: Implement wizard step 4: HIL preferences
description: Add step 4: four decision categories with three modes each (Automated, Notify and proceed, Requires approval). Default: Scope/Architecture require approval; others automated.

title: Implement wizard step 5: repository initialization
description: Add step 5: confirm and execute. Backend: create project dir, git init, bd init, create .opensprint/ structure, write settings.json, add to project index. Show progress and errors.

title: Alpha: Core Platform Scaffold
close_reason: Alpha Core Platform Scaffold complete: monorepo with backend, frontend, shared; Express API, WebSocket, React Router; build and tests pass

title: Replace build start/pause text buttons with play/pause icons
description: Update the build controls UI to use play and pause icons instead of text labels ('Start' and 'Pause') for the build action buttons. This improves visual clarity and reduces UI clutter while keeping the same functionality.
